Recipe.title: Marinara Sauce
Recipe.Description:
These days, it is cheapest and easiest to buy an inexpensive can of spaghetti sauce. However, when you want something really good, you want to make it yourself.
This recipe makes a very sweet marinara sauce. It is great with spaghetti, but it can also be used for Pizza, Lasagna, Chicken Parmesan, etc.

section.instruction: In a saucepan, mix all ingredients together.
Heat on medium until it starts to boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.

Notes.note:
When used as a Pizza Sauce, the Garlic and Onion must be finely minced to avoid making the Sauce chunky.
Or:
Instead of Garlic, you can use the same amount of Garlic Powder.
Instead of Onion, you can use the same amount of Onion Powder.

The sauce can be made ahead of time and kept in the fridge for several days.
This means you can make a large batch, then use it for Pizza one day, Spaghetti the next, etc.

Modifications.modification: To make it a bit sweeter, add 2-3 Tablespoons Brown Sugar.
